description: Grants the user's body the properties of rubber, allowing them to stretch and become immune to blunt attacks and electricity.

users.circumstances: Luffy accidentally ate the fruit as a child

abilityReveals.description: A Gear Third technique where Luffy inflates his leg bone and brings it down in a devastating axe-kick attack.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Used against Rob Lucci during their battle on the Marine battleship, destroying part of the ship and knocking out Marines.

abilityReveals.description: A Gear Third technique where Luffy inflates his leg and swings it in a wide arc, creating a powerful whip-like attack.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Used to attack the masts of the Marine ship during the battle with Lucci, demonstrating Gear Third's versatility for wide-area attacks.

name.japanese: ネコネコの実 モデル:豹
name.romanized: Neko Neko no Mi, Moderu: Reoparudo

description: A Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to transform into a leopard and leopard-human hybrid. The fruit grants enhanced speed, strength, and predatory instincts, making it ideal for assassination and combat.

users.circumstances: Lucci consumed the fruit at some point before joining CP9

abilityReveals.description: A powerful Rokushiki technique where Lucci creates a massive bird-shaped compressed air blade using his claws in leopard form. The attack can cleave through battleship hulls.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Used against Luffy during their battle, cutting through the iron hull of a Marine battleship to demonstrate the synergy between his Zoan powers and Rokushiki techniques.

strengths.strength: Enhanced Rokushiki techniques when combined with Zoan form
strengths.description: The leopard form's claws allow for more powerful and precise Rokushiki attacks like Rankyaku: Gaicho.
